Name: Stoneshard: Prologue
About the game: Stoneshard: Prologue is a demo to Stoneshard , an old school turn-based RPG, inspired by Diablo and classic roguelikes. Stoneshard is currently in development and will be released into Early Access on February 6, 2020. Stoneshard: Prologue was created to present an overall concept of the game over 2-3 hours of gameplay. Key features: Familiarize yourself with the basic mechanics of the main game. Learn the backstory of one of the key characters of Stoneshard â€” Verren. Explore the dark catacombs of the abandoned abbey. Try out a variety of skill trees, from greatswords and bows to pyromancy and geomancy. Find the best equipment to survive an onslaught of the bloodthirsty Proselyte cult. A thoughtful health system: apply splints to damaged body parts, practice bloodletting, lift your dampened spirits with alcohol and use drugs to deal with pain. Face the mysterious cult leader. Will you be able to defeat him?
